amendment.description: Insert at the end, before the short title, the following new section: \ SEC.__. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to carry out sections 2912, 2913, and 2914 of the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Act of 1990 (part A of title XXIX of Public Law 101-510; 10 U.S.C. 2687 note) related to the 2005 round of base closures and realignments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prevent use of funds for carrying out secs. 2912, 2913, and 2914 of the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Act of 1990 related to the 2005 round of base closures and realignments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hostettler amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 57 - 358 (Roll no. 334).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Hostettler.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hostettler amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 57 - 358 (Roll no. 334).
